My headline

When you build your site, all of the keys in the entire JSON file, or the header of the Markdown files, are sent to the Blade template as individual variables.

The template used is specified in the view variable (via the structure in your resources directory). The ~fully-parsed~ HTML from the Markdown content under the heading area is accessible through a single variable called $content.

Subhead
